backend/main.mo: Main Motoko actor for the Kingston Customizations backend, handling blob storage for homepage and logo images, user profile management, and role-based access control with admin/user permission checks.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report documenting that the Kingston Customizations logo is saved as a static asset and loaded directly in the Hero and Header components without backend fetching.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: JSON map of short summaries for each frontend source file, describing the purpose and key implementation details of every component, page, hook, and config file.
frontend/index.html: Root HTML entry point for the React app, setting the page title to 'KingstonCustomizations LLC Website' and mounting the app via the /src/main.tsx module script.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root React component that configures TanStack Router with home (/) and admin (/admin) routes inside a RootLayout wrapped by ThemeProvider and QueryClientProvider.
frontend/src/components/About.tsx: About Us section component with a dark slate gradient background, company description for Kingston Customizations LLC, and three value-proposition cards (Experience, Integrity, Excellence) with yellow-400 icon accents.
frontend/src/components/Contact.tsx: Contact section displaying email, phone (call or text), business hours, and an Arizona location badge, styled with yellow-400 accents and a dark business-hours card.
frontend/src/components/Footer.tsx: Site footer with a dark slate gradient, company logo, contact info, services quick-links, and a credentials/promise column, all using yellow-400 accent colors and Kingston Customizations LLC branding.
frontend/src/components/Gallery.tsx: Renders a responsive image gallery grid with 10 project photos, supporting a lightbox modal with previous/next navigation and category badges on hover.
frontend/src/components/Header.tsx: Fixed top navigation header with logo, branding, scroll-aware styling, a dropdown menu for section navigation, and an admin panel link.
frontend/src/components/Hero.tsx: Full-screen hero section displaying the company logo and a headline tagline on a white background.
frontend/src/components/Services.tsx: Displays a grid of 8 service cards (remodels, carpentry, drywall, etc.) each with an image, title, and description on a dark gradient background.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: React Query hook that creates and caches an authenticated or anonymous ICP backend actor based on the current Internet Identity, invalidating dependent queries when the actor changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides an InternetIdentityProvider context and useInternetIdentity hook for managing DFINITY AuthClient login, logout, and identity state with status tracking.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Collection of React Query hooks for backend interactions including user profile CRUD, admin checks, and image upload/retrieval mutations for homepage and logo images.
frontend/src/index.css: Global CSS file that sets up Tailwind directives, defines light/dark mode CSS custom properties using OKLCH color values, and adds utility animations (fade-in, slide-in) plus image/text rendering optimizations.
frontend/src/main.tsx: React app entry point that wraps the App component with QueryClientProvider (React Query) and InternetIdentityProvider before mounting to the DOM.
frontend/src/pages/AdminPage.tsx: Admin page component that handles Internet Identity authentication, user profile creation, and admin-only image uploads (homepage image and logo) with file validation and previews.
frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx: Main public-facing page that composes all landing page sections (Header, Hero, Services, Gallery, About, Contact, Footer) and implements scroll-based header show/hide behavior with smooth section navigation.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration that maps OKLCH CSS variables to semantic color tokens, extends theme with custom border radius, shadows, and accordion animations, and registers typography, container-queries, and animate plugins.
project_state.json: Project state metadata tracking the current version, known issues (logo image flash on load), existing fix features for Hero and Header components, and the requirement to use a static asset path for the Kingston Customizations logo.
